Name: NACCREAS
Description: Primary reason for coming to ADC

Codes.1: To participate in a research study
Codes.4: Both (to participate in a reasearch study and to have a clinical evaluation

Codes.2: Non-professional contact (spouse/partner, relative, friend, coworker, etc.)
Codes.4: ADC clinician, staff, or investigator referral
Codes.5: Nurse, doctor, or other health care provider
Codes.6: Other research study clinician/staff/investigator (non-ADC; e.g., ADNI, Women's Health Initiative)

Codes.1: Mild (noticeable, but not a significant change)
Codes.2: Moderate (significant, but not a dramatic change)
Codes.3: Severe (very marked or prominent a dramatic change)
